Html:
Hello.
I'm just starting my adventure with GMap and I have a small problem.
I want to make car animation (as marker) moving between two points A and B.
Im using MapRoute and its ok but points of that route have different distance between.
How can I make route where points will have for example distance of 1m between each other?
I need it to set location of a car after some period of time (speed of car can change during his move).
Is it possible to make something like GetPointAtDistance() in GMap .NET?
